name: atom-mocha-snippets

0.8.0.name: atom-mocha-snippets
0.8.0.description: Snippets for the Javascript/Typescript BDD framework Mocha: https://mochajs.org/. It works based on language detection, ES5 for JavaScript language and ES6 for Babel-JavaScript language

toggleSemicolons.description: When enabled adds semicolons to the end of the expressions

toggleDoubleQuotes.description: When enabled changes the default quotes to double quotes (i.e. ")
